item.description:
Drupal Camp 2012, Jan 21 (snow day Jan 28)

Many great proposed sessions have been accepted and the schedule is now posted on the camp website. In addition, a "showcase bazaar" (currently labeled "BOF") will be held in a computer lab (room 325) for people to present informally about something cool, interesting, and useful. 

There will be coffee and bagels in the morning (thanks to Common Media, Knectar and Acquia), pizza and soda for lunch (thanks to left-click and Barule Group), and an after party (thanks to left-click)! Please see our Sponsors page and visit them to learn about the great companies that have come together to make this possible ( http://2012.drupalcampma.com/sponsors ).

Check out the site and get invovled: http://drupalcampma.com/

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Drupal Camp 2012
